room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mission: Breakout Lafayette in Lafayette (IN)
room_address: 325 South Earl Avenue, Suite 3 Lafayette, IN 47904
room_description:
You and several others have been handpicked by a professional thief named Curns. Each of you is an expert in your respected field. This bamboozling stranger has requested your services to break into vaults and infiltrate government facilities to steal from corrupt, unethical people!
You will be a modern-day Robin Hood taking from people known to be involved in highly illegal and unethical ventures that go against the common good. Your goal, once youâ€™ve broken in, is to collect a valuable CD, a diamond, a gold bar, and cash!
